description: Curated scholarships for international students: UK A-level and undergraduate, Canada (e.g. Study in Canada, Lester B. Pearson, UBC), and Singapore (NUS & NTU ASEAN). Filter by tag and get recommendations based on your profile.

results.message: SOAS Undergraduate International Academic Excellence Scholarship
results.eligibility: Overseas fee-paying students. AAB or equivalent at A-Level (or equivalent). Full-time undergraduate.

results.amount: £3,000 first year; £2,000 subsequent years (up to £7,000 total)
results.eligibility: Self-funded international students from specified countries. Enrolling full-time undergraduate.

Citizens of eligible countries in Asia, Europe, Middle East, Africa. Enrolled full-time at post-secondary in eligible country. Short-term exchange (4 months / one term). Canadian institution applies on your behalf.

results.amount: Tuition, books, incidental fees, full residence support for four years
results.deadline: School nomination Oct; U of T application Oct; Pearson form Nov (check site for year)
results.eligibility: International students (study permit). Final year of secondary school or graduated no later than June prior year. Beginning undergrad at U of T. School must nominate (one per school per year).

results.amount: Full tuition (after MOE grant), S$5,800 living allowance, S$3,000 accommodation, S$1,750 one-time computer allowance
results.deadline: Apply via NUS undergraduate admission; outcomes by mid-July
results.eligibility: Citizens of ASEAN member countries (excluding Singapore). Outstanding high school results. Good co-curricular and leadership. Full-time undergraduate at NUS. Not transfer applicants.

results.amount: Full subsidised tuition, S$5,800 living allowance, S$3,000 accommodation, S$1,750 one-time computer allowance
results.deadline: With NTU undergraduate application — check NTU admissions
results.eligibility: Citizens of ASEAN countries (except Singapore). Strong A-level / IB / polytechnic / Year 12 equivalent. Full-time undergraduate at NTU. Leadership and co-curricular record. Minimum CGPA 3.5/5.0 to retain.

results.message: Imperial College London International Baccalaureate Excellence Scholarships
results.amount: £5,000 per year for duration of studies
results.deadline: April (check year); automatic consideration via application
results.eligibility: International students studying IB diploma. Engineering, natural sciences, or business. Automatic nomination based on academic excellence; no separate form.

results.message: British Council Study UK scholarships and funding
results.amount: Varies by programme (e.g. GREAT £10,000 for postgraduate)
results.eligibility: International students. British Council lists UK scholarships and bursaries; filter by level and country. Includes university-specific and GREAT programmes for eligible countries.

results.message: UBC International Leader of Tomorrow Award
results.amount: Need- and merit-based; can cover full tuition and living costs
results.eligibility: International students applying to UBC from outside Canada. Academic achievement, leadership, engagement. Must demonstrate financial need.

results.amount: Varies (tuition support, allowances; often with bond)
results.eligibility: Criteria vary by scheme (e.g. ASEAN, merit-based). Often for citizens of ASEAN or selected countries. Apply via participating Singapore universities (NUS, NTU, SMU, etc.).
